en.title: Your divorce
en.name: Name
en.respondToApplication: Respond to your {{ session.divorceWho }}'s divorce application
en.getDecreeNisi: Your {{ session.divorceWho }} gets a decree nisi
en.readApplication: You need to read your {{ session.divorceWho }}'s application before you give your response. You can find a copy in the letter that was sent to you, and a digital version with guidance on what each section means on the next screen.
en.responseAcknowledgement: Your response is legally known as the 'acknowledgement of service'.
en.respond7Days: You must respond to the application within 7 days of receiving the letter. If you donâ€™t, your {{ session.divorceWho }} can ask the court to move the divorce forwards without you. You may have to pay extra fees if this happens.
